issue.title: [C++] Native client interface to SQL Server / TDS protocol
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3155](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3155). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to be able to use the FreeTDS API or native SQL Server APIs on Windows to query data efficiently to Arrow format from SQL server.
